articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: Kashmir attack: Does India’s Indus Waters Treaty freeze threaten Pakistan? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Pakistan has deemed India’s suspension of the Indus Waters Treaty following tourist attack in Pahalgam an ‘act of war’.
articles.content: In tit-for-tat moves this week, India and Pakistan have entered a strategic standoff following Tuesdays attack on tourists in Pahalgam, Indian-administered Kashmir, which resulted in the deaths of at… [+12626 chars]
